difficulties.name: Vanilla + Items
difficulties.description: Play the vanilla game with the Mod config and the new infected and inventory

difficulties.name: Casual Survivor
difficulties.description: Recommended for the faint of heart, this version is made for players that want to explore the lore game.

difficulties.name: Survivor
difficulties.description: Recommended for first time players of DL2 that want a good fight and many improved systems.

difficulties.name: Ultimate Survivor
difficulties.description: Deadly world. Biters can run and climb. Increased spawns and difficulty. Consider this Nightmare Mode.

difficulties.name: Insanity
difficulties.description: The end of the line. The Biters are mixed but the world reacts to the noise you make, leaving you always on guard
